import './App.css'; import freeCodeCampLogo from './img/FreeCodeCamp_logo.png' import Boton from './componentes/Boton' import Pantalla from './componentes/Pantalla'; import Clear from './componentes/Clear'; import {useState} from 'react'; function App() { const [input, setInput] = useState('ola'); return (
1 2 3 +
4 5 6 -
7 8 9 *
= 0 . /
Clear
); } export default App;
